name: Square Enix announces Murdered: Soul Suspect for Xbox 360, PS3, PC
text: Square Enix just sent over an official announcement for an upcoming title scheduled for release in 2014 for Xbox 360, PS3, and PC titled Murdered: Soul Suspect. Not a lot of information being revealed on this one just yet, no developer attached with Square Enix just giving themselves the publishing nod in the official PR. Theres a small 33 second trailer embedded below to check out, which seems to imply that youll be investigating your own murder, along with some supernatural elements.Im definitely curious to see what this ends up being, L.A. Noire Ghost Detectives maybe? Who knows! Anyways, check out the official PR release below, along with that previously mentioned trailer.[youtube_sc url=http://youtu.be/V3v3fM9BbQQ]LOS ANGELES (Feb. 20, 2013) Square Enix Inc., the publisher of SQUARE ENIX interactive entertainment products in the Americas, today challenges gamers to solve the hardest case of all their own murder.
